short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark great online articles with a single click to easily access them on your blog.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin allows users to conveniently bookmark their favorite articles from different webpages directly to their own blog websites. With a single click, it provides a simple and fast way to collect and store articles.
